    | text      = This all makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:20.840
    | text      = It all makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:21.840
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:22.840
    | text      = It's all coming together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:23.840
    | text      = The government bank robbers is being a little bit misreported by Alex here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:28.380
    | text      = This is about brothers Walter and Carl LeGrand, who were executed by the state of Arizona
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:33.280
    | text      = in 1999 for a bank robbery that went wrong back in 1982.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:38.800
    | text      = They weren't illegal immigrants the way Alex is trying to present the situation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:42.800
    | text      = They were born in Germany, but their mother had fled to the United States when one brother
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:46.639
    | text      = was four and the other was five.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:48.739
    | text      = They had essentially lived here their whole lives, but they had never become US citizens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:53.199
    | text      = The brothers were robbers by trade and the bank robbery had happened just after they'd
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:57.960
    | text      = been released from prison for robbing a string of supermarkets in Tucson the year before.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:03.400
    | text      = They were trying to rob the Valley National Bank in Marana, Arizona, and Alex has almost
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:09.159
    | text      = all of the details of this crime wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:11.960
    | text      = They showed up before the bank opened and there were no customers there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:15.880
    | text      = They didn't shoot anyone because the gun they had was a toy gun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:20.260
    | text      = They did murder the bank manager when he couldn't open the safe because he only had half of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:24.760
    | text      = the combination, but they did that by stabbing him 24 times with a letter opener.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:29.119
    | text      = God damn!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:30.119
    | text      = They attempted to kill the other person who was in the bank at the time, too, who was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:33.000
    | text      = an employee named Dawn Lopez, but they only managed to stab her a few times, which proved
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:37.920
    | text      = to be not lethal but bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:41.320
    | text      = The police didn't surround the bank and then the brothers gave up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:45.119
    | text      = Another employee showed up and thought that they saw something suspicious going on inside,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:49.960
    | text      = so this other employee, she wrote down the license plate numbers of cars outside.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:55.280
    | text      = When the LeGrands left and the police showed up, she gave them the plate numbers and the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:59.360
    | text      = cops tracked the brothers down that way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:01.880
    | text      = Alex has basically taken a real life case and transposed all of the elements of bank
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:06.000
    | text      = robbery movies onto it, and that's what he's accepted as truth of what happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:10.739
    | text      = It's nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:11.739
    | text      = Yeah, he believes every bank robbery is the opening five minutes of the dark night.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:15.679
    | text      = Everybody get down!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:16.679
    | text      = Yeah, it's the Joker showing up, everybody in the gang murders each other at the end.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:20.960
    | text      = And then these Germans drove a school bus?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:22.480
    | text      = Absolutely, yeah, absolutely!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:23.480
    | text      = 100%!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:24.480
    | text      = They drove it out and even though there was dust on it, they got into a line of school
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:27.440
    | text      = buses and nobody was the wiser!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:29.199
    | text      = I would rather if Alex just relayed the plot of The Inside Man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:33.079
    | text      = That would be way better!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:34.079
    | text      = Because that's confusing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:35.079
    | text      = I'd love to see him try and explain that plot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:38.440
    | text      = God, it'd be wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:40.199
    | text      = Anyway, this case is actually really, really interesting, and the way it played out in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:45.119
    | text      = the courts is something that's worth talking about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:47.480
    | text      = And it intersects with Alex's ideology.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:49.719
    | text      = But before we talk more about that, let's see if he understands what happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:54.559
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:55.559
    | text      = Because he definitely doesn't understand the crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:57.480
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:58.480
    | text      = But then what ended up happening in relationship to their death penalty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:01.559
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:02.559
    | text      = Let's see, here's how Alex explains it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:04.559
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:05.559
    | text      = They gave him the death penalty, and the court was about to hear the case, well, the Supreme
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:11.000
    | text      = Court, well, the state went ahead and executed him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:16.400
    | text      = Because the Supreme Court didn't agree to hear the case first off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:20.079
    | text      = Well, Ginsburg then said, oh, this is horrible, in the future, we will follow the edicts of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:26.079
    | text      = the International Criminal Court and the World Court of Human Rights and all these other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:31.239
    | text      = kangaroo institutions that have been set up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:34.199
    | text      = So that's what Alex, that's how he explains it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:36.199
    | text      = Okay, so Ginsburg, after this case, was like...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:39.880
    | text      = Allen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:40.880
    | text      = Well, naturally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:41.880
    | text      = I saw the best minds of my German generation executed for a bank robbery.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:45.920
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:46.920
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:47.920
    | text      = So then Justice Ginsburg goes, well, Constitution's out the window, we gotta follow the EU.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:55.079
    | text      = We whiffed on this one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:56.280
    | text      = Oh, bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:57.280
    | text      = Let's go ahead and...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:58.280
    | text      = Let's just steal the Constitution.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:59.920
    | text      = So here's what actually happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:01.559
    | text      = On the day that Walter LeGrand was set to be executed, Germany filed with the International
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:05.840
    | text      = Court of Justice, seeking a provisional court order so the US would pause the execution.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:10.880
    | text      = The ICJ did give this provisional order.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:14.239
    | text      = From there, the Supreme Court decided that they didn't have any jurisdiction to hear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:17.880
    | text      = this provisional order, since it was the state of Arizona that was carrying out the execution,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:22.800
    | text      = and the federal courts can't hear lawsuits brought by another country against a state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:27.280
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:28.280
    | text      = A bunch of arguments flew around about whether or not executing the men would violate the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:31.559
    | text      = Vienna Convention, but ultimately, all of the US parties seemed to take the position
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:35.800
    | text      = that international law wasn't legally binding, and that the actions that were being taken
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:40.840
    | text      = weren't actually violations of this convention.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:43.119
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:44.119
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:45.119
    | text      = Then in 2001, the ICJ ruled that the US had violated rules about consular relations, because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:50.320
    | text      = the LeGrand brothers were never told by Arizona law enforcement that as German nationals,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:55.559
    | text      = they had the right to contact the German consulate for help.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:58.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:59.800
    | text      = And they weren't informed of that ability to-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:01.800
    | text      = Oh, well, bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:02.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:03.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:04.800
    | text      = Though they did eventually contact the consulate, the delay was argued to have hindered Germany's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:07.880
    | text      = ability to protect its nationals' interests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:10.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:11.639
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:12.639
    | text      = It wasn't a case of Ginsburg just saying that we need to bow down to international court
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:15.480
    | text      = edicts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:16.480
    | text      = It was a situation where the ICJ determined that the US had violated an agreement that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:20.400
    | text      = we entered into willingly with other governments.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:23.480
    | text      = We signed it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:24.480
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:25.480
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:26.480
    | text      = It's a bit more complicated than the presentation that Alex is making.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:30.079
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:31.079
    | text      = And obviously, because he doesn't know what happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:32.920
    | text      = No, of course not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:33.920
    | text      = That is-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:34.920
    | text      = He's just kicking and screaming about the idea that people respect the opinions of other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:39.719
    | text      = countries.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:40.719
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:41.719
    | text      = Especially when it's their nationals' citizens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:43.719
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:44.719
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:45.719
    | text      = And Germany was probably like, don't kill people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:49.880
    | text      = I mean, we don't do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:51.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:52.519
    | text      = I think there is an interesting sort of discussion to be had about the German nationals' aspect
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:00.000
    | text      = of it, because they had lived in the United States essentially their whole lives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:03.880
    | text      = Sure, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:04.880
    | text      = So there is a technicality there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:06.519
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:07.519
    | text      = But I don't know how meaningful it is in terms of refuting the circumstances of the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:14.039
    | text      = Well, in terms of change and eventually how much people care, it was very little.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:22.480
    | text      = I think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:23.480
    | text      = Well, I mean, this is two years later and Alex has essentially forgot all the details
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:27.119
    | text      = of the crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:28.119
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:29.119
    | text      = All the details of the court thing that happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:31.059
    | text      = It's just, A, globalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:32.400
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:33.400
    | text      = Ooh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:34.400
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:35.400
    | text      = Very dumb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:36.400
    | text      = That's such a weird situation to have to have like six courts just argue made up nonsense
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:42.579
    | text      = back and forth at each other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:44.599
    | text      = Like no, no, no, we can't do this because of some dude in 1700s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:48.599
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:49.599
    | text      = Oh my God.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:50.599
    | text      = Arizona's going to kill this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:51.599
    | text      = Arizona's going to kill this guy anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:52.599
    | text      = Oh my God.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:53.599
    | text      = That's so stupid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:54.599
    | text      = Oh man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:55.599
    | text      = See, 150 years ago, we, yeah, sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:00.280
    | text      = So Alex believes that all these European courts and all this stuff, it's all kangaroo courts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:06.480
    | text      = You know where that term comes from?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:08.039
    | text      = Australia?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:09.039
    | text      = Alex knows.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:10.039
    | text      = Oh yeah?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:11.039
    | text      = They are kangaroo in every way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:14.219
    | text      = And where do we get the term kangaroo court?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:16.199
    | text      = I got this great book.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:17.400
    | text      = It's a...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:18.400
    | text      = Oh boy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:19.400
    | text      = It's why do we say it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:23.159
    | text      = You can look up any saying, about 150 years ago, they would execute you for any reason
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:27.579
    | text      = in Australia and the British courts would, they would have juries under the Magna Carta,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:34.719
    | text      = but they would go out and appoint the juries that would always be the police and government
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:39.039
    | text      = officials on the jury.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:40.760
    | text      = And so the people of the island nation began to say it'd be better if they just had a group
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:48.360
    | text      = of kangaroos.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:50.420
    | text      = It's a kangaroo court and anyway, side issue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:53.440
    | text      = Side issue?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:54.800
    | text      = I love that book.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:55.800
    | text      = It's over there on the bookshelf in the studio.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:58.239
